overview: Julia, an impaired elderly lady left to take care of her grandson as her daughter goes to work, faces a big decision when accidentally dropping her grandsonâ€™s only edible food: help the starving toddler using her new crutches to find food outside or in her selfishness, refuse to use them out of shame.
tagline: An impaired elderly woman struggles physically to save her grandson from starving.
title: Away in Silence
